ChooseBox_title: How many boxes do you need?
ChooseBox_content: Please select the size and number of boxes you need. We will calculate the monthly fee based on the number of boxes you need and the size that you choose.
ChooseAddress_title: Where would you like us to send it?
ChooseAddress_content: Your boxes will be delivered to you 2 days before your selected pick up date.
ChooseAddress_howItWorksContent: After you confirm your booking we will send the boxes to you so that you can pack your belongings before the scheduled pick up.
ChooseAddress_howToStep1Title: Select your boxes and move in date
ChooseAddress_howToStep1Content: You select the amount and size of boxes you need and the date you want to move in
ChooseAddress_howToStep2Content: We send your ordered boxes to your doorstep
ChooseAddress_howToStep3Content: We collect all your boxes directly from you
ChooseAddress_howToStep4Content: We will safely deliver all your boxes to our warehouse
ChooseMoveInDate_title: From when do you need to store your stuff?
ChooseMoveInDate_content: Choose a date for us to collect your boxes. We will send you the empty boxes for packing at two days before this date.
Details_medium_size: Dimensions: W38.5 x L58 x H25(cm)
Details_large_size: Dimensions: W38.5 x L58 x H35(cm)
Details_sendTheBoxesToYourAddress: We will send the boxes to your address
Details_youMustSecure: *You must secure boxes with your own locks
Details_contentPleaseNote: Please note that deliveries are only made on weekdays.
